column3: I don't know uhh…  Well, I'm Joey
Yeah, I'm disgusting, I take my underwear off in other people's homes
I'm tired of covering for you two
Thank you Joey, thank you so much
Oh hey, no, you're not welcome
Yesterday, Rachel found your razor in our bathroom and I didn't know what to say, so I said it was mine and-and that I was playing a woman in a play
And one thing led to another and
And around the ankles, y'know that is a tough spot
All this lying has been hard on us too
Oh-oh, yeah-yeah, I bet all the sex makes it easier
We'll try to be more careful okay
It's just that, we don't want everyone to know because this is going really well, and maybe the reason it's going really well is because it's a secret
I know it sounds really weird, but we're just so bad at relationships
But,  you do it with me once
I'm taking a literature class at the New School and I have to finish it for the first session tomorrow
I didn't know you were taking a class
Well, I really liked that Lamaze class I took
Y'know and this time I thought I'd go for something, y'know a little more intellectual, with a less painful final exam
Ooh, you should come with me
Oh yeah, then I'd have someone to sit with
Okay—ooh, but are you going to have time to read it
Oh, I read that in high school
This is going to be so much fun
Someone at work ate my sandwich
Well, what did the police say
I can't believe someone ate it
Look, I am 30 years old, I'm about to be divorced twice and I just got evicted
That sandwich was the only good thing going on in my life
Someone ate the only good thing going on in my life
Okay, look, I-I have enough stuff for one more sandwich, I mean I was going to eat it myself, but
I-I still can't believe someone ate it
I mean, look, I left a note and everything
Ross Geller's lunch, please don't take me
I'm surprised you didn't go home wearing your lunch
Okay, look you wanna hold onto your food
I learned that living on the street
So what would you say Pheebs
Stuff like uh, "Keep your mitts off my grub
Say Ross, when you picture Phoebe living on the street, is she surrounded by the entire cast of Annie
Okay, this will keep them away from your stuff
Phoebe, you are a bad ass
Someday I'll, tell you about the time I stabbed the cop
Sorry I'm late, but I left late
So Pheebs, what is the book about
I thought you said you read it in high school
Well yeah, but then I remembered I started it and there was this pep rally and I was, I was on top of the pyramid but anyway—umm, what is this book about
Okay, umm, it's this tragic love story between Cathy and Heathcliff and umm, it takes place on like these really creepy mores in England
Which I think represents the wildness of Heathcliff's character
How would you characterize the theme of this book, uh let's see here , Rachel Green
Umm, well I would have to say that it's a, it's tragic love story
Well, that's sort of a given, but yes
And uh, the-the uh, wildness of the mores, which I think is-is mirrored in the wildness of Heathcliff's character
What Rachel has shrewdly observed here…
Well, honey that was pretty obvious
I think that uh, yours is a question with many answers
Would ya care to venture one
Would you care to venture one
Are you just repeating what I'm saying
Are you just repeating what I'm saying
Yeah but why didn't you just say that you didn't read the book
Be-because I didn't want him to think I was stupid
I mean, that was really embarrassing what happened to you
Not only did no one touch my sandwich, but people at work are actually afraid of me
Yeah, a guy called me mental
Mental Geller, yeah, I always wanted a cool nickname like that
Yeah, the best you got in high school was Wet Pants Geller
Anyway, people are writing reports for me, uh pushing back deadlines to meet my schedule, I'm telling you, you get tough with people you can get anything you want
Hey Tribbiani, give me that coffee
I've been wondering if you were going to ask me out
I can't believe you thought that you were going to video tape us having sex on the first date
Joey, is what she just said umm—Oh my God
And with Chandler in the next room
What are you, what are you sick
You guys promised you'd be more careful
The good Joey name is being dragged through the mud here
Well, I'm telling everyone about you
That's the only way to explain the underwear and the video camera that doesn't make me look like a pig
There's got to be a better explanation
You can tell them you had to make an adult film for your  adult film class
But no-no, how does that explain why Rachel found my underwear at your place
Well, get ready to come out of the non-gay closet
I promise we'll come up with something
Just give us a little more time
Hey, but it better make me look really, really good
Oh, and another thing, the video camera
May I have a word with you
We've been getting reports of some very angry behavior on your part
Threatening letters, refusal to meet deadlines, apparently people now call you mental
We want you to speak to a psychiatrist
Umm, this is all because of a sandwich
You see my-my sister makes these amazing turkey sandwiches
Her secret is, she puts a, an extra slice of gravy soaked bread in the middle; I call it the Moist Maker
Anyway, I-I put my sandwich in the fridge over here…
I, I-I-I believe I ate that
Did you confuse it with your own turkey sandwich with a Moist Maker
Do you perhaps seeing a note on top of it
There may have been a-a joke or a limerick of some kind
That said it was my sandwich
Come look in my office, some of it my still be in the trash
I-I-I-I-I had to throw most of it away
So umm, what's this book about
You didn't read this one either
Well, I was gonna, but I accidentally read something else
Hey, so tell me about this Jane Eyre woman
Okay, all right, so Jane Eyre, first of all, you'd think she's a woman, but she's not
Yeah, this book was light years ahead of its time
So, what did everybody think about Jane Eyre
Umm, Rachel and I were just discussing it and she had some very interesting insights
Umm, well, what struck me most when reading Jane Eyre was uh, how the book was so ahead of its time
If you're talking about feminism, I think you're right
Yeah, well, feminism yes, but also the robots
Okay, so umm, since that video camera thing didn't work out uh, I thought that I would give you just a little preview
I saw a psychiatrist at work today
Which I may say, right now, is out of control
He gave me a pill for it
Well, when the psychiatrist told me I had to take a leave of absence because I yelled at my boss I started to get worked up again, so he offered me a tranquilizer
And I thought was a good idea so, I took it
Wait a minute, they're making you take time off work
It's going to be weird not having a job for a while, but I, I definitely don't care about my sandwich
I can't believe you let me go on and on like that
It was just so funny when you started comparing Jane Eyre to Robocop
You weren't taking the class seriously
I thought this was going to be something we could do together
Y'know, I thought it would be fun
Fun is good, but y'know I also wanted to learn
Y'know, people are always talking about what they learned in high school and I never went to high school
Oh, so you really wanted to learn
Yeah, y'know, Pheebs I just wanted to have fun
Ohh, you know who you should go with
Joey has got a secret peephole
He has a naked picture of Monica
He takes naked pictures of us
And then he eats chicken and looks at them
Let's give our friend Joey a chance to explain why he's such a big pervert
I think I can explain this
I am not a sex addict
That's the only way to explain all this stuff
Because you can also explain it with the truth
let's see what everybody thinks of that
Uh yes, but it was, we just did it once uh, in London
This is not good for my rage
How else would you explain all the weird stuff that's been going on
Okay, but if it only happened that one time, how come we found your underwear in our apartment the other day
That was the underwear I was wearing that night in London
I guess I wanted to keep it  as a souvenir
Are you sure you're not just a sex addict
If anyone's a sex addict here, it's Monica
She has been trying to get me back in the sack ever since London
So that's why she gave you a naked picture of herself
I guess I set up the video camera to try and entice Joey
But sadly I could not be enticed
I mean you really kept Joey's underwear
I stalk guys and keep their underpants
Well, I think we've all learned something about who's disgusting and who's not
All right, now, I'm going to get back to my bucket
I'm only eating the skin, so the chicken's up for grabs
I really thought you making a good point
I mean y'know, until you got cut off
Yeah, what's up with that girl Monica
I just convinced Paul to give us a test next week
Tests make us all better learners
